title: Guess That - LoL Online Game
body:
**[Sorry for the re-post, I've fixed a few things to do with the legal status of the game and the online version itself.]**

*Can YOU guess your favorite League of Legends characters?*

My friend and I have been working on an Android & iOS mobile application. It's called Guess That - LoL and it's recently been released and I wanted to help spread the news. It's currently on Androids store Google Play and will be coming to the iOS App Store soon. You can play a shortened version online here:
http://bit.ly/1xdgimd
If you really enjoyed the online version you can download the full version (which is completely free) by searching your app store with: com.darkpixelgames.guessthatlol

If you notice any bugs please do post them here, and if you would like to give some constructive criticism please do.
Have a great day summoner.

replies.body: In regards to the trial version I think it would be better if it was 15 random champs. I got stuck on one, realised it was the first 15 champs alphabetically and then got through it no trouble. It just makes it seem too easy.

Gj!

The game is loading for me atm, waiting to try it out!
